text: 8.31: Zo 16.13Firip maaŋ ana nzuaim, mba Itiopia guma ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the mba buni ndɨɨri bun nan suaŋgirga fhu, gu ram muuŋgip mba buni ndɨɨri kaŋgirie?” Ana maaŋ Firip ga nzuav, mbaram khaŋ Firip ga nzuai, “Ndu zɨv, na han kha karisan ndav na han khaŋ pera.” Firip Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun Itiopia guma ga nzuai. (8.26)
